HotelElement.Name: HOTEL KUPELI PALACE (Formerly Sidera Palace Hotel)

Description.Text: Great hotel for location and relation price/quality. Good option to have a great experience in Istanbul with a medium/small budget. (JMG 02/09) The exterior is a lovely Ottoman style house with a peculiar shape. This special class category hotel is located in the heart of Istanbul's historic peninsula, within walking distance of the major sites such as the Topkapi Palace, Archaeology Museum, St. Irene Church, Sultanahmet Square, Grand Bazaar and Egyptian Bazaar. It is also very close to the Bosphorus promenade.

Guest Rooms - This family run hotel has only 17 rooms. All rooms are medium size and in perfect condition. The style can be defined as traditional and are extremely clean. Bathrooms are slightly small due the type of building but again, in perfect condition. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, telephone, bathtub, hair dryer, cable TV and a mini refrigerator.
